<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Downgrade the debug info in a module to contain only line table information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to convert debug info to what -gline-tables-only would have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// created, this does the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   1) Delete all debug intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   2) Delete all non-CU named metadata debug info nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   3) Create new DebugLocs for each instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   4) Create a new CU debug info, and similarly for every metadata node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      that&#39;s reachable from the CU debug info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   All debug type metadata nodes are unreachable and garbage collected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8564d7984f31fb685c319f454cc4f372">stripNonLineTableDebugInfo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Utility to find all debug info in a module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DebugInfoFinder tries to list all debug info MDNodes used in a module. To</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// list debug info MDNodes used by an instruction, DebugInfoFinder uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// processDeclare, processValue and processLocation to handle DbgDeclareInst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DbgValueInst and DbgLoc attached to instructions. processModule will go</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// through all DICompileUnits in llvm.dbg.cu and list debug info MDNodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used by the CUs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debuginfofinder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debuginfofinder">DebugInfoFinder</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Assignment Tracking (at).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at">at</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Utilities for enumerating storing instructions from an assignment ID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A range of instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a2a9623a09605e579132b9170a901f89b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a2a9623a09605e579132b9170a901f89b">AssignmentInstRange</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iterator-range">iterator&#95;range&lt;SmallVectorImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;::iterator</a>&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return a range of instructions (typically just one) that have \\p ID</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as an attachment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Iterators invalidated by adding or removing DIAssignID metadata to/from any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction (including by deleting or cloning instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a2a9623a09605e579132b9170a901f89b">AssignmentInstRange</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a12eb3d832354ce03752e78d9a5df50dd">getAssignmentInsts</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diassignid">DIAssignID</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return a range of instructions (typically just one) that perform the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// assignment that \\p DAI encodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Iterators invalidated by adding or removing DIAssignID metadata to/from any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction (including by deleting or cloning instructions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#ab90d9147100854fef19dc8d4493d163e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a2a9623a09605e579132b9170a901f89b">AssignmentInstRange</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/at/#a12eb3d832354ce03752e78d9a5df50dd">getAssignmentInsts</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgassignintrinsic">DbgAssignIntrinsic</a> &#42;DAI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
